Type FakeAccessorRegistrarExtensions

Namespace Machine.Fakes

This class implements the several way that can be used to work with the Registrar API.

Methods

  • Configure
  • Configure<TInterfaceType>
  • Configure<TInterfaceType, TImplementationType>
  • Use<TInterfaceType>

Public static methods

void Configure(this IFakeAccessor accessor, Action<Registrar> registrarExpression)

Shortcut for Configure. This one will create a registrar for you and allow configuration via the delegate passed in via registrarExpression.
Parameters
IFakeAccessor accessor

Specifies the fake accessor

Action<Registrar> registrarExpression

Specifies the configuration for the registrar.

void Configure<TInterfaceType>(this IFakeAccessor accessor, TInterfaceType instance)

Uses the instance supplied by instance during the creation of the sut. The specified instance will be injected into the constructor.
Parameters
IFakeAccessor accessor

Specifies the fake accessor

TInterfaceType instance

Specifies the instance to be used for the specification.

void Configure<TInterfaceType, TImplementationType>(this IFakeAccessor accessor)

Registered the type specified via as the default type for the interface specified via . With this the type gets automatically build when the subject is resolved.
Parameters
IFakeAccessor accessor

Specifies the fake accessor

void Use<TInterfaceType>(this IFakeAccessor accessor, TInterfaceType instance)

Uses the instance supplied by instance during the creation of the sut. The specified instance will be injected into the constructor.
Parameters
IFakeAccessor accessor

Specifies the fake accessor

TInterfaceType instance

Specifies the instance to be used for the specification.
